DELETE FROM w_withdraw_wallet_bill WHERE
`user_id` = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND
`platform` = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`order_id` = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`direction` = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND
`coin_type` = #{coinType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`token` = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`contract` = #{contract,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`sender_address` = #{senderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`receiver_address` = #{receiverAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`amount` = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND
`block` = #{block,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND
`tx` = #{tx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`trade_step` = #{tradeStep,jdbcType=CHAR} AND
`operation_type` = #{operationType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`transfer_flag` = #{transferFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND

`remark` = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
`create_time` = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND
